episode_summary: In this episode, Michelle Berman-Michael discusses the importance of building a community and creating loyalty on Instagram through storytelling. She emphasizes the need to move away from generic talking head videos and instead focus on content that resonates emotionally with the audience. By leveraging the concept of neural coupling, agents can enhance engagement and stand out in a crowded market.
